name: Braking Bad: Bad Braking
description:
WE COULDNT AFFORD TO REPAIR YOUR BRAKES RIGHT BEFORE THE DEMO!

*Not indicative of final product*

Controls:
  • W - Accelerate
  • S - Reverse
  • A and D - Turning
  • Space - Boost
  • Shift - Brake
Objective:

Give the kidswhat they want!

Use to Go Faster

Known Bugs:
  • Pause menu has no function.
  • Viewport is pretty rough.
